channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Hyper-V Network Switch
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Hyper-V Network Switch

item.title: CVE-2017-0051|2024-08-05T12:55:17.320Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- hyper-v%20network%20switch
item.description: Microsoft Windows 10 1607 and Windows Server 2016 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application hang) via a crafted Office document, aka "Microsoft Hyper-V Network Switch Denial of Service Vulnerability." This vulnerability is different from those described in CVE-2017-0074, CVE-2017-0076, CVE-2017-0097, CVE-2017-0098, and CVE-2017-0099.
